title: ´More depth would help Miami´, says Mascherano after Messi ruled out of Cincinnati clash
description: Inter Miami head coach Javier Mascherano believes his side could benefit from new additions to the squad. The Herons face FC Cincinnati in their next game, but will be without both Lionel Messi and Jordi Alba for this fixture after they received one-match bans for opting out of the MLS All-Star Game. He could prove […] The post ´More depth would help Miami´, says Mascherano after Messi ruled out of Cincinnati clash appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Man Utd will not sell players cheaply, says Amorim
description: Ruben Amorim warned rival clubs they could be in for a “surprise” if they wait too long to sign Manchester United’s unwanted players for cheap at the end of the transfer window. At the start of pre-season, five wantaway players were exiled from the United squad – Marcus Rashford, Jadon Sancho, Alejandro Garnacho, Antony and […] The post Man Utd will not sell players cheaply, says Amorim appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
